<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Razor Disc](/Shields.aspx?ID=14)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Integrated 1d6 S" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=481" />
<trait label="Shield Throw 20 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=490" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 21 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 5 gp

**AC Bonus** 1 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 4

**HP (BT)** 16 (8)
</row>

</column>

---

Several small blades line the outside edge of this steel shield. This specialized throwing shield is common among warriors in the Mwangi Expanse, where its blades can cut down foliage as it flies.
name: Razor Disc
